name: 5PPEH
description: By striking the five vital points, the Miyako priests teach advanced tamers how to doom and immunize a target for 5 turns.
effectText: 5PPEH inflicts a single other target with a 5 turn countdown of the Doomed Condition but also gifts them with the Immune Condition for 5 turns.

name: Acid Reflux
description: Toxolotl draws from the Toxic essence of Xolot, moderately damaging and Poisoning the whole team for 2 turns.
effectText: Acid Reflux deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally and inflicts them with the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Allergic Spread
description: A burst of allergen spores that inflicts damage on the whole team.
effectText: Allergic Spread deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Ampere Outburst
description: Volgon's Heavenly Might unleashes a wave of power that sweeps the battleground, affecting everyone except the user, overextending them and vigorizing you for 2 turns.
effectText: Ampere Outburst causes all other combatants on the battlefield to be overexerted the next turn and gifts the user with the Invigorated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Antitoxins
description: Advanced antitoxins that cure poison on the inoculated target and invigorate them for 2 turns.
effectText: Antitoxins cures a single team of the Poisoned Condition and gifts them with the Invigorated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Aqua Bullet Hell
description: A devastating Water technique developed by legendary tamer Dan Maku.
effectText: Aqua Bullet Hell deals damage to a single other target.

name: Aqua Stone
description: "An ingenious application of hydraulic pressure for ballistic purposes" - Sophia d'Arissola.
effectText: Aqua Stone deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with an Earth ally, its damage increases to 104.

name: Aquatic Whirlwind
description: This Water technique is faster than an angry Kalabyss.
effectText: Aquatic Whirlwind deals damage to a single target.

name: Autodestruction
description: Let's press the big red button with the danger signs! The Digital attacker inflicts massive damage and self-destructs in the process.
effectText: Autodestruction's damage formula is close, but not exactly equal to, the combination of the damage it would deal based on ATK and the damage it would deal based on DEF. The exact formula is intended to be:

name: Awful Song
description: Ninety-nine Temesseeeence viaaaals! This horrible Tucmani drinking song does considerable damage... especially to reputations, inflicting isolation for 3 turns.Used in combination with a Neutral ally, the Awful Song inflicts damage on the whole team.
effectText: Awful Song deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Isolated Condition for 3 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Neutral ally, its targeting changes Other Team or Ally. As such, if the user targets themselves and the synergy activates, only the user's ally will be damaged.

name: Bamboozle
description: Give'em the old razzle dazzle! The target evades for 2 turns.
effectText: Bamboozle gifts a single target with the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Bark
description: This Tem's bark is much worse than its bite - it gives the enemy DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Bark inflicts a single other target with DEF and SPDEF .

name: Bark Shield
description: Omninenesian Temtem use pieces of Banyan bark as shields, giving the whole team DEF .
effectText: Bark Shield gifts a single team with DEF .

name: Base Jump
description: It's not the jump that hurts, it's the landing - and it hurts the target A LOT.
effectText: Base Jump deals damage to a single other target.

name: Beef Up
description: This reinforcing technique grants ATK to the target. Eat your proteins, Tamers!.
effectText: Beef Up gifts a single target with ATK .

name: Bestial Charge
description: A primal charge, like the stampede on the Kisiwa plains! It inflicts damage on the whole team.
effectText: Bestial Charge deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Beta Burst
description: A mighty beta-wave surge that bombards the target with a subatomic barrage.
effectText: Beta Burst deals damage to a single other target.

name: Binary Flood
description: It's either 1 or 0. And it's not 0... This technique inflicts moderate damage on the whole team and seizes for 2 turns.
effectText: Binary Flood deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally and also inflicts the Seized Condition for 2 turns..

name: Blackhole
description: Gravity in the Middle Sphere is capricious and mild - but this technique still causes a great deal of damage and wipes all statuses from the target.Used in combination with an Earth ally, Blackhole also wipes all stage changes.
effectText: Blackhole deals damage to a single target and cures/removes their Status Conditions.
synergyText: If used with an Earth ally, is priority increases to Normal and it also removes the target's Stat Stage Changes.

name: Blizzard
description: Cold and furious like the mistral winds in the Thalassian Cliffs.
effectText: Blizzard deals damage to a single other target.

name: Block
description: Thou shall not pass! A Melee technique that confers DEF .
effectText: Block gifts the user with DEF .

name: Blue Screen
description: Feel that shiver down your spine when you see that screen? It inflicts 2 turns of frozen... and considerable frustration on a whole team.
effectText: Blue Screen inflicts a single team with the Frozen Condition for 2 turns.

name: Boomerang
description: Originated as an Omninesian technique to reach hanging fruit in the jungle canopy.
effectText: Boomerang deals damage to a single other target.

name: Brace
description: Survival is often the greatest of victories. Only effective if the Temtem is already alerted; removes it, gives evading for 2 turns and heals 10%.
effectText: Brace gifts the user with the Evading Condition for 2 turns and restores 10% of their maximum HP if they already have the Alerted Condition. The Alerted Condition is removed after.

name: Bright Beam
description: Beam me up! This technique makes you alert and able to evade for 2 turns.
effectText: Bright Beam deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally and gifts the user with the Alerted Condition and Evading Condition for 2 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Crystal ally, its damage increases to 45.

name: Bubbles
description: Bubbles! <3 This weakens the target by means of extreme cuteness.
effectText: Bubbles deals damage to a single other target.

name: Burrow
description: "In a hole in the ground there lived a Temtem..." which allowed it to evade for 4 turns.
effectText: Burrow gifts the user with the Evading Condition for 4 turns.

name: Cage
description: In you go, Nick! Everyone on the battlefield gets Trapped for 2 turns.
effectText: Cage inflicts all combatants on the battlefield with the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Chain Heal
description: Healing is a collective process - in clockwise order, 3 Temtem recover 15% health.
effectText: Chain Heal restores 15% of a single target's and two other combatant's maximum HP in clockwise order from the initial target. When only two combatants are on the battlefield, the initial target will restore 40% while the remaining target will restore 15%.

name: Chain Lightning
description: This miracle of Electric manipulation bounces 3 times clockwise for as long as it deals damage, dealing decreasing damage with each hit.
effectText: Chain Lightning deals damage to a single target then two other combatants in clockwise order from the initial target. The initial target takes 100% of the damage, the second takes 70%, and the third takes 60%. The chain of damage will fail to continue to the next target if the damage was blocked by the current target. Damage can be blocked if the target who would have taken damage has the Evading Condition or the Electric Synthesize Trait.

name: Chains Hit
description: A fire technique that whips the opponent with heavy chains and them for 2 turns.
effectText: Chains Hit deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Charcoal Wall
description: The blackest of barriers, blunts even the fiercest of attacks. It increases the user's SPDEF .
effectText: Charcoal Wall gifts the user with SPDEF .

name: Charge
description: There's a time for cunning strategy, and there's a time for charging head-on. This one is for the latter case.
effectText: Charge deals damage to a single other target.

name: Charged Iron Filings
description: Do NOT let your 'Tem eat these. This technique inflicts moderate damage on the whole team and nullifies it for 2 turns.
effectText: Charged Iron Filings deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally and gives them the Nullified Condition for 2 turns.

name: Cheer Up
description: Lifts the spirits of the target and gives -1 Hold.
effectText: Cheer Up decreases the Hold of all the techniques of a single target by 1.

name: Clay Ball
description: Mudslinging to see what sticks? It won't do much damage, but it slows them down... Inflicts moderate damage and SPD
effectText: Clay Ball deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with SPD .

name: Clinch
description: Give me a hug, bro! Ouch... but... not... like... thaaat...
effectText: Clinch deals damage to a single other target.

name: Cold Breeze
description: A shivery draft that deals light damage and chills the target with Cold for 1 turn.
effectText: Cold Breeze deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 1 turn.

name: Cold Geyser
description: A icy stream from the depths, this soaker inflicts moderate Water damage and leaves you cold for 2 turns.
effectText: Cold Geyser deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Composure
description: Clear the field! Composure removes all status conditions and stage modifications from all Temtem on the battlefield.
effectText: Composure removes all status conditions and stat stage changes from every Temtem currently on the battlefield.

name: Confiscate
description: Gimme all your stuff! The target is Seized for 3 turns.
effectText: Confiscate inflicts a single other target with the Seized Condition for 3 turns.

name: Cooperation
description: Team equality! This equalizes all team members' STA with the team average and the whole team recovers 10% HP.
effectText: Cooperation takes a single team's current total STA, then evenly splits it between the team's combatants and heals 10% of their maximum HP.

name: Cozy Net
description: Arachnyte are adept weavers, and their webs look so temptingly soft... This technique traps a target for 3 turns and makes it fall asleep for 2 turns.Used in combination with a Nature ally, Cozy Net also regenerates the user for 3 turns.
effectText: Cozy Net inflicts a single other target with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns and the Trapped Condition for 3 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Nature ally, it also gifts the user with the Regenerated Condition for 3 turns.

name: Crystal Bite
description: What do Crystal Temtem eat? Surely not other Temtem... but they can still take a vicious bite.
effectText: Crystal Bite deals damage to a single other target.

name: Crystal Deluge
description: It's raining 'Tems, hallelujah! This special Crystal technique inflicts moderate damage and isolates it for 3 turns.Used in combination with a Mental ally, Crystal Deluge makes you asleep for 2 turns and increases priority.
effectText: Crystal Deluge deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Isolated Condition for 3 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Mental ally, its priority increases to High and also inflicts the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Crystal Dust
description: A miniature version of the "star-rain" that is said to have spawned the Archipelago.
effectText: Crystal Dust deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with a Wind ally, its damage increases to 80 and priority increases to Very High.

name: Crystal Plume Gatling
description: What's more damaging than a feather gatling? Well, a * Crystal shard* gatling! Worse than a broken mirror!
effectText: Crystal Plume Gatling deals damage to a single other target.

name: Crystal Spikes
description: This nano-Anak analogue tectonic effect causes crystal shards to extrude from the ground and do damage.
effectText: Crystal Spikes deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Stream
description: Thought to have originated in unexplored submarine caves, these Koish are capable of inflicting moderate Crystal damage.
effectText: Crystal Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Crystal Torrent
description: "Chromeon, make our victory Crystal clear!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Crystal Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Crystallize
description: Inspired by the ruins of the Amethyst Barrens, this crystal crust provides protection at the expense of speed: DEF but SPD .
effectText: Crystallize gifts the user with DEF and the Immune Condition for 2 turns but also inflicts them with SPD .

name: Cyberclaw
description: You think the cyber world can't reach you here. Think again. This technique is fast and inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Cyberclaw deals damage to a single target.

name: Darkness
description: Where is everybody!? All Temtem in the battlefield are Isolated for 2 turns, negating any synergies.
effectText: Darkness inflicts all combatants on the battlefield with the Isolated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Data Burst
description: Data input overflow! This sensory overload causes moderate damage.
effectText: Data Burst deals damage to a single other target.

name: Data Corruption
description: Hacking your opponent's database takes some time, but it's worth it. This technique weakens SPDEF .
effectText: Data Corruption inflicts a single other target with SPDEF .

name: DC Beam
description: Lightning, an elemental force; not extremely powerful, but always reliable.
effectText: DC Beam deals damage to a single other target.

name: Debris Typhoon
description: A good brute-force technique if you don't mind tidying up later.
effectText: Debris Typhoon deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with a Wind ally, its damage increases to 95.

name: Defibrillate
description: Quick, give me another shock! This technique inflicts moderate damage and isolates it for 3 turns.
effectText: Defibrillate deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Isolated Condition for 3 turns.

name: Denigrate
description: Sticks and stones... but this mental humiliation hurts too. It inflicts damage and SPATK on the whole team.
effectText: Denigrate deals damage and inflicts SPATK to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Depress
description: Aren't we all? Just take another nap. This technique inflicts exactly 120 damage without waking up the target.
effectText: Depress deals an exact 120 damage to a single other target, regardless of DEF, SPDEF, Type Effectivness, or Traits. It will also not cause a target afflicted with the Asleep Condition to wake up.

name: Diamond Fort
description: Harder than the hardest Crystal Temtem! It confers DEF and SPDEF while also gifting for 3 turns.
effectText: Diamond Fort gifts the user with DEF , SPDEF and the Nullified Condition for 3 turns.

name: Digital Stream
description: It is a complete mystery how some Koish have developed Digital attacks, but this one is capable of moderate damage.
effectText: Digital Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Digital Torrent
description: "Chromeon, cancel all their downloads and log 'em out!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Digital Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Digital Whip
description: Like being slapped with a snippet of code - its bark is much worse than its byte! This technique does little damage.
effectText: Digital Whip deals damage to a single other target.

name: Digithreat
description: Just like trash-posting, this technique is a slow way of inflicting damage to the mind...All those trash-posts are messing with your head... Used in combination with a Mental ally. Digithreat dooms the target for 4 turns.
effectText: Digithreat deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with a Mental ally, it also inflicts a 4 turn countdown of the Doomed Condition.

name: Dim Mak
description: An accurate strike at the target's main pressure point, ignoring its defenses to deal exactly 100 damage without waking it up.
effectText: Dim Mak deals an exact 100 damage to a single other target, regardless of DEF, SPDEF, Type Effectiveness, or Traits. It will also not cause a target afflicted with the Asleep Condition to wake up.

name: Divine Inspiration
description: All hail our lord and savior, Pigepic! This technique increases the team's SPDEF and heals the whole team by 15%
effectText: Divine Inspiration gifts a single team with SPDEF and restores 15% of their maximum HP.

name: DNA Extraction
description: The needle-prick doesn't inflict much damage, but Mimit uses the DNA sample to adapt its defense, bestowing SPD .
effectText: DNA Extraction deals damage to a single other target and gifts the user with SPD .

name: Double Edge
description: Cuts both ways, in true Neutral fashion - inflicts moderate damage to the target, but also gives it DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Double Edge deals damage to a single other target and gifts them with DEF and SPDEF .
synergyText: If used with a Neutral ally, its damage decreases to 1.

name: Double Kick
description: An effective and cool-looking double kick inspired by Cipanki action movies.
effectText: Double Kick deals damage to a single other target.

name: Drill Impact
description: Nothing does armor piercing damage like a drill to the head.
effectText: Drill Impact deals damage to a single other target.

name: Drool
description: Babawa leaves this sticky mucus everywhere, which reputedly has healing properties... it regenerates the target for 2 turns and grants it immunity for 3 turns.
effectText: Drool gifts a single target with the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns and the Immune Condition for 3 turns.

name: Drought
description: A bone-dry technique that leaves every Temtem on the battlefield except the user Exhausted and Seized for 2 turns, and the attacker overextended next turn.
effectText: Drought inflicts all other combatants on the battlefield with the Seized Condition and the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns but causes the user to be overexerted the next turn.

name: Dust Vortex
description: This technique buffets the enemy with the fury of the fiercest Kisiwan sandstorm.
effectText: Dust Vortex deals damage to a single other target.

name: Earth Stream
description: This brown-water Koish subspecies has developed the skill to inflict moderate Earth damage.
effectText: Earth Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Earth Torrent
description: "Chromeon, run them into the ground!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Earth Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Earth Wave
description: Feel the Earth shake under your feet, rising with Anak-like force: slow, but devastating for the whole team.
effectText: Earth Wave deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Earthbreaker
description: Myrisles engineers hate this odd trick! Make the Earth shake and deal massive damage to the target.Used in combination with a Electric ally, it changes the technique type to Electric and the target is Seized for 2 turns.
effectText: Earthbreaker deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with an Electric ally, it becomes Electric Type, damage increases to 175 and also inflicts the Seized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Electric Storm
description: True Electric storm like the monsoon over Cipanku. Damages whole team.
effectText: Electric Storm deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Electric Stream
description: This Koish subspecies can deliver a short Electric discharge to inflict moderate damage.
effectText: Electric Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Electric Torrent
description: "Chromeon, give them a shocking experience!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Electric Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Electromagnetism
description: Electromagnetically bound, attacker and target are trapped for 2 turns, while target gets SPD .
effectText: Electromagnetism inflicts a single other target and the user with the Trapped Condition for 2 turns and inflicts the target with SPD .

name: Electropunch
description: Disco might be dead, but electro still packs A LOT of punch...
effectText: Electropunch deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with a Digital ally, its priority increases to High.

name: Embers
description: Shower your opponent in burning embers. Fire technique that burns for 1 turn.
effectText: Embers deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Burned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Energy Manipulation
description: A simple yet quick Mental attack that exhausts the target for 1 turn.Used in combination with a Nature ally, Energy Manipulation does additional damage and exhausts for 2 turns.
effectText: Energy Manipulation deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Exhausted Condition for 1 turn.
synergyText: If used with a Nature ally, its damage increases to 60 and the Exhausted Condition lasts for 2 turns.

name: Execution
description: "Omnes vulnerant, postuma necat". Slowly the hour creeps onwards... it does only slight damage, but if that leaves the Temtem under 45% of their total HP... it's over for them.
effectText: Execution deals damage to a single other target and if this damage would put them below 45% of their maximum HP, they're instead instantly knocked-out.

name: Extinction
description: "Look up! See that cool meteorite... Extinction gives 3 turns of Doomed and 2 turns of burned to everyone on the battlefield."
effectText: Extinction inflicts all combatants on the battlefield with a 3 turn countdown of the Doomed Condition and inflicting them for 2 turns with the Burned Condition.

name: Extra Energy Slam
description: A simple truth about Temtem fighting - the stronger you are, the harder you hit. This Neutral technique inflicts variable damage depending on the launcher's STA.
effectText: Extra Energy Slam deals damage to a single other target with its damage varying based on the user's current STA.
synergyText: The following formula applies:

name: Faraday Cage
description: This classic science experiment, weaponized. This technique inflicts decent damage and exiles the target for 3 turns."...and then he drank the battery liquid!" Used in combination with a Toxic ally, Faraday Cage poisons the target for 2 turns.
effectText: Faraday Cage deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Isolated Condition for 3 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Toxic ally, it also inflicts the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Fierce Claw
description: Raw as untamed Temtem and unstoppable as a Kisiwan stampede.
effectText: Fierce Claw deals damage to a single other target.

name: Fiery Heist
description: Put your hands up, this 'Tem's too hot to handle! This technique seizes and burns for 2 turns.Used in combination with an ally, Fiery Heist seizes and burns for 4 turns.
effectText: Fiery Heist inflicts a single other target with the Seized Condition and the Burned Condition for 2 turns.
synergyText: If used with an Earth ally, the Seized Condition and the Burned Condition last for 4 turns.

name: Fiery Soul
description: An alter ego of flames, channeled directly from the Anak spirit, which inflicts moderate damage and burns the enemy for 1 turn.
effectText: Fiery Soul deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Burned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Finbeat
description: Also known as "siren slap". Hurts your pride more than anything else.
effectText: Finbeat deals damage to a single other target.

name: Fire Flame
description: Blazing like the depths of Anak, this flame geyser scorches your enemies.
effectText: Fire Flame deals damage to a single other target.

name: Fire Stream
description: Smoke on the water! Many novice tamers are surprised to see Koish use a Fire attack, with moderate effects.
effectText: Fire Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Fire Tornado
description: Unleash a mighty Fire storm against your opponents. Try not to wear anything flammable...
effectText: Fire Tornado deals damage to a single target.

name: Fire Torrent
description: "Chromeon, burn 'em to a crispy crisp!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Fire Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Firewall
description: Effective protection against hackers and hostile Temtem... it bestows 4 immunity for 4 turns, and increases the user's DEF and SPDEF .
effectText: Firewall gifts the user with the Immune Condition for 4 turns and gifts DEF and SPDEF .

name: Flaming Meteorite
description: Some Temtem can call on Highabove forces to bring down a fiery Fire inferno on one enemy.
effectText: Flaming Meteorite deals damage to a single target.

name: Flood
description: Watch the opponent get all bogged down. The whole team gets SPD .A mess of Mudshire proportions. Used in combination with an Earth ally, gives the enemy team SPD .
effectText: Flood inflicts the rival team or the user's ally with SPD .
synergyText: If used with an Earth ally, its STA Cost decreases to 22 and it instead inflicts SPD .

name: Fluid Barrier
description: Real protection is not about unmovable strength, but dynamic defense. This technique gives the target immunity for 2 turns and SPDEF .
effectText: Fluid Barrier gifts a single target with SPDEF and the Immune Condition for 2 turns.

name: Footwork
description: Advanced balance training developed by Tucmani rockhoppers: it confers SPD .
effectText: Footwork gifts the user with SPD .

name: Frond Whip
description: Feel the true force of Nature, unleashed as a savage lash of the whip!
effectText: Frond Whip deals damage to a single other target.

name: Gaia
description: Invoke the ancient spirit of the Omninesian jungle to recover 100% STA and regenerates the user for 2 turns.
effectText: Gaia gifts the user with the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns and restores 100% of their maximum STA. The user will still overexert if they lack the required STA before use.

name: Gamma Burst
description: The shorter the wavelength, the higher the damage. This mighty technique costs a lot of stamina but leaves the target even more exhausted.
effectText: Gamma Burst deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns.

name: Generify
description: Anything is better than generic. This technique nullifies you for 2 turns.Even more generic? Used in combination with a Neutral ally, Generify nullifies and lets you evade for 2 turns.
effectText: Generify gives the user the Nullified Condition for 2 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Neutral ally, it also gifts the user with the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Glass Blade
description: Like death by a thousand cuts... but this is just one of them.
effectText: Glass Blade deals damage to a single other target.

name: Goring
description: You mess with the horns, you get the... No, wait! This fast, Neutral technique does serious damage.
effectText: Goring deals damage to a single other target.

name: Gust
description: Sometimes, a single sigh is enough to topple a weakened enemy - and they'd better be, for this fast technique inflicts very minor damage.Every sigh contributes, until it's a gale storm... Used in combination with an ally, damage increases and traps the enemy for 1 turn.
effectText: Gust deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with an Electric ally, its damage increases to 75, priority increases to Very High and also inflicts the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Haito Uchi
description: A slashing open-hand strike in the Cipanki martial arts tradition. Inflicts Physical damage and leaves them Asleep the same turn.
effectText: Haito Uchi deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Asleep Condition for 1 turn.

name: Hallucination
description: Suggestive and Toxic visions that exhaust the mind and tire and trap the target for 2 turns.Used in combination with a Mental ally, the Hallucination does Special damage.
effectText: Hallucination inflicts a single other target with the Exhausted Condition and the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.
synergyText: If used with a Mental ally, its class becomes Special with 100 damage.

name: Harmful Lick
description: Some Temtem lick you to signify affection... and some use it as a powerful attack! Eww!
effectText: Harmful Lick deals damage to a single other target.

name: Harmful Microwaves
description: Make your enemies feel like reheated coffee does! This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Harmful Microwaves deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with an Electric ally, its STA Cost decreases to 18 and priority increases to High.

name: Hasty Lunge
description: An all-out attack, no time or thought for defense! It's fast, inflicts moderate damage but also overextends the user during their next turn.Used in combination with a ally, Hasty Lunge doesn't overextend the user.
effectText: Hasty Lunge deals damage to a single other target but causes the user to be overexerted the next turn.
synergyText: If used with a Nature ally, it won't overexert the user.

name: Head Charge
description: There are many clever uses for a large skull. This is not one of them, but it's effective.
effectText: Head Charge deals damage to a single other target.

name: Head Ram
description: Use your head, non-metaphorically.
effectText: Head Ram deals damage to a single other target.

name: Heat Up
description: Hey, I'm still warming up! ATK .
effectText: Heat Up gifts the user with ATK .

name: Heavy Blow
description: Effective and unsubtle, like a Tucmani mine drill.
effectText: Heavy Blow deals damage to a single other target.

name: Held Anger
description: All that suppressed rage keeps building up... until it bursts in a nova of wrath.
effectText: Held Anger deals damage to a single other target.

name: Helicopter Kick
description: Created by the legendary sensei Shunlee Bandamme, this spectacular technique inflicts damage upon the whole enemy squad.
effectText: Helicopter Kick deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Hellfire
description: Hell hath no fury like a tamer scorned - and this one does serious Fire damage to a whole team.Used in combination with a Fire ally, this technique inflicts extra damage and burns the rival team for 1 turn.
effectText: Hellfire deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.
synergyText: If used with a Fire ally, its damage increases to 100, priority increases to High and also inflicts the Burned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Hibernate
description: Just a little nap while it's cold outside... The target is Frozen for 3 turns but recovers 35% of health and stamina.
effectText: Hibernate restores 35% of the user's maximum HP and STA but also inflicts the user with the Frozen Condition for 3 turns.

name: High-pressure Water
description: An industrial-grade water jet that packs real punch.Used in combination with a Fire ally, it produced boiling water that inflicts Burn for 2 turns.
effectText: High-pressure Water deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with a Fire ally, it also inflicts the Burned Condition for 2 turns and priority increases to High.

name: Hologram
description: Let them attack your digital ghost while you evade them for 1 turn.
effectText: Hologram gifts the user with the Evading Condition for 1 turn.

name: Hook
description: A quick lunge for that unprotected jaw. This technique doesn't do much damage, but gives the attacker ATK .
effectText: Hook deals damage to a single target and gifts the user with ATK .

name: Hook Kick
description: Very few Temtem are still kicking after receiving this kick!
effectText: Hook Kick deals damage to a single target.

name: Horror
description: Unspeakable nightmares! Obviously, they can only hurt an asleep target, but they do massive damage to the sleeper.
effectText: Horror deals damage to a single target if they're afflicted with the Asleep Condition.

name: Humiliating Slap
description: A bruised ego hurts more than a wounded body. This is just the thing! DEF .
effectText: Humiliating Slap deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with DEF .
synergyText: If used with a Crystal ally, Humiliating Slap inflicts DEF and the Isolated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Hurricane
description: This technique is named after a former Dojo Master who was once a contender for the title of Champion of the Archipelago... It damages the whole enemy team.Used in combination with a Digital ally, Hurricane also increases the user's SPD
effectText: Hurricane deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.
synergyText: If used with a Digital ally, it also gifts the user with SPD and deals 77 damage.

name: Hyperkinetic Strike
description: When you gotta hit hard and fast - the faster, the harder. Inflicts extra damage depending on the Temtem's SPD.
effectText: Hyperkinetic Strike deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: Hyperkinetic Strike's damage formula is close, but not exactly equal to, the combination of the damage it would deal based on SPATK and the damage it would deal based on SPD. The exact formula is intended to be:

name: Hypnosis
description: A brain hack developed by Arburian Mind specialists that makes the target Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Hypnosis inflicts a single other target with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Hypoxia
description: Watch your enemies choke as you turn around and... take their breath away.
effectText: Hypoxia deals damage to a single target.

name: Ice Cubes
description: An extreme version of the ice water bucket challenge that does real damage.Used in combination with a Wind ally, produces Cold for 1 turn.
effectText: Ice Cubes deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with a Wind ally, its STA Cost decreases to 9 and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 1 turn.

name: Ice Shuriken
description: An obscure technique created by the secretive Iwaba clan, deep in the Cipanki hills, which inflicts Cold for 2 turns.
effectText: Ice Shuriken deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Iced Stalactite
description: Cold *does* bother you anyway... This giant icicle inflicts damage and also Cold for 2 turns.
effectText: Iced Stalactite deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Cold Condition for 2 turns.

name: Inner Spirit
description: It is said this technique channels the spirit of a long-lost, draconic variety of Temtem, for massive damage.
effectText: Inner Spirit deals damage to a single target.

name: Intimidation
description: That "don't mess with me" look makes the target team exhausted for 2 turns. Also grants the user evading for 1 turn.
effectText: Intimidation inflicts the rival team or the user's ally with the Exhausted Condition for 2 turns and gifts the user with the Evading Condition for 1 turn.

name: Jaw Strike
description: Temtem with powerful jaws always know how to use them...
effectText: Jaw Strike deals damage to a single other target.

name: Jinxed Whisper
description: Shh! Shut up, you're jinxing your chances! The target falls asleep for 2 turns, but the user gets overextended on the next turn.
effectText: Jinxed Whisper inflicts a single other target with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns but causes the user to be overexerted the next turn.

name: Kick
description: Primal and instinctive, sometimes a good kick is all you need.
effectText: Kick deals damage to a single other target.

name: King's Roar
description: When the king roars, the rest run away. Decreases SPD , ATK and SPATK of the other team.
effectText: King's Roar inflicts the rival team or the user's ally with SPD , ATK and SPATK .

name: Knockback
description: What goes around comes around! This mighty attack inflicts massive damage, but the user gets 30% knockback damage.
effectText: Knockback deals damage to a single other target but causes the user to take 30% of the damage dealt as recoil.

name: Late Torment
description: The first cut is the deepest, but the last one hurts like Downbelow. This Neutral Technique only works on trapped enemies and inflicts 180 damage.
effectText: Late Torment deals damage to a single other target if they're afflicted with the Trapped Condition.

name: Laundry

synergyEffects.effect: Removes positive Stat Stage changes from the target.

description: Look, nobody likes doing laundry, but it has to be done, OK? It cleans all statuses, naturally! (And does some damage to boot.).Used in combination with an ally, Laundry washes away all positive stage modifications on rivals.
effectText: Laundry deals damage to a single target and cures/removes all of their Status Conditions.
synergyText: If used with an Electric ally, its priority increases to High and removes positive Stat Stage changes from the target.

name: Lava Wave
description: Some Temtem like a hot batch, and some like it PIPING hot. This technique inflicts moderate damage.Love me a streamin' bath! Used in combination with a Water ally, Lava Wave seizes for 3 turns and increases priority.
effectText: Lava Wave deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with a Water ally, its priority increases to High and inflicts the Seized Condition for 3 turns.

name: Leech
description: Normally Taifu prefer cookies... but if there's nothing else available, they'll strike and heal themselves 40% of the damage dealt.When paired with a Water Temtem, Taifu strike harder and heal themselves for 50% of the damage dealt.
effectText: Leech damages a single other target and restores 40% of the damage dealt to the user.
synergyText: If used with a Water ally, its priority increases to High and the user is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Lifeful Sap
description: The sap of life, from the living heart of the Giant Banyan. Heals 10% HP for 5 turns.
effectText: Lifeful Sap gifts the user with the Regenerated Condition for 5 turns.

name: Look out
description: This Temtem has (metaphorical) eyes on the back of its head. This hyperalert state makes it alerted for 5 turns and removes the Asleep status condition.
effectText: Look out gifts a single target with the Alerted Condition for 5 turns and cures them of the Asleep Condition. Unlike other techniques, it will set the duration of any previously gifted Alerted Conditions to 5 turns.

name: Lullaby
description: Twinkle twinkle little Tem / Whole opponent team falls Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Lullaby inflicts the rival team or the user's ally with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Madness Buff
description: There is an edge to this madness - those willing to take 30% Damage will get SPDEF and SPATK .
effectText: Madness Buff causes the user to lose 30% of their maximum HP and then is gifted SPATK and SPDEF .

name: Magma Cannon
description: Like a surge of Anak lava to the face! Fire technique that burns for 3 turns.
effectText: Magma Cannon deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Burned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Major Slash
description: This blow targets the enemy's weak spot for massive damage.
effectText: Major Slash deals damage to a single other target.

name: Martial Strike
description: Many Melee Temtem are trained to perform this basic but effective technique.
effectText: Martial Strike deals damage to a single other target and grants the user SPATK .

name: Matter Teleport
description: Feels like being disintegrated into molecules - not nice. This Mental technique inflicts heavy damage.
effectText: Matter Teleport deals damage to a single target.

name: Mechanical Heat
description: Every moving part generates residual heat - and this is a way to weaponize it and inflict moderate damage.
effectText: Mechanical Heat deals damage to a single other target.

name: Meditation
description: Sync your breathing, become more aware of the space around you, feel your body and mind get Vigorized for 3 turns...
effectText: Meditation gifts the user with the Invigorated Condition for 3 turns.

name: Melee Stream
description: With strong muscles developed by swimming against the current, some Koish can do moderate Melee damage.
effectText: Melee Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Melee Torrent
description: "Chromeon, show them your wrestling moves!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Melee Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Mental Stream
description: Related to ancient Cipanku river kami, this Koish has Mental powers that deliver moderate damage.
effectText: Mental Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Mental Torrent
description: "Chromeon, mess with their heads!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Mental Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Metabolize
description: This metabolic enhancement reacts to poison in the target's body by purging it and recovers 20% of health.Used in combination with a Nature ally, improved assimilation of nutrients regenerates the Temtem for 2 turns.
effectText: Metabolize cures a single other target of the Poisoned Condition, restores 20% of the user's maximum HP and grants for 1 turn if the target was cured from the Poisoned Condition.
synergyText: If used with a Nature ally, it also gifts the user with the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Death from above... A barrage of flaming meteorites that inflicts Fire damage on the whole team.It's raining fire! Inflicts burns on the whole team.
effectText: Meteor Swarm deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.
synergyText: If used with a Fire ally, its damage increases to 90 and also inflicts the Burned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Mineral Hail
description: Imagine a Crystal storm in the darkest depths of Mictlan... Now just watch the enemy team.
effectText: Mineral Hail deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.

name: Mirror Shell
description: "Mirror, mirror in my hand, who's the best tamer in the Archipelago?" "No idea, but you get SPDEF ".
effectText: Mirror Shell gifts the user with SPDEF .

name: Misogi

synergyEffects.effect:
3 Turns  Immune
Removes negative Stat Stage Changes

description: The priests of Miyako developed this technique to eliminate all altered states and stages on the Temtem.Using this Waterfall meditation with a Water ally, the target becomes Immune for 3 turns and is freed from all negative stage modifications.
effectText: Misogi cures/removes all Status Conditions gifted/given/inflicted on the target and also removes the target's Stat Stage Changes.
synergyText: If used with a Water ally, it also gifts the target with the Immune Condition for 3 turns and only negative Stat Stage Changes are removed.

name: Mud Shower
description: Some of the larger Temtem of the savannah love this Earth technique, as messy as it is fun!
effectText: Mud Shower deals damage to a single target.

name: Multiple Pecks
description: A rapid-fire flurry of furious beaks.
effectText: Multiple Pecks deals damage to a single other target.

name: Nagaise's Fury
description: lä, lä! Nagaise is calling some Water friends from the deeps... The whole enemy team will regret this.Used in combination with a Mental ally, Nagaise's Fury inflicts extra damage.
effectText: Nagaise's Fury deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally.
synergyText: If used with a Mental ally, its damage increases to 130.

name: Narcoleptic Hit
description: A potent attack that exhausts the attacker's psyche, making it fall Asleep for 2 turns.
effectText: Narcoleptic Hit deals damage to a single other target but inflicts the user with the Asleep Condition for 2 turns.

name: Nature Stream
description: Koish that live in dense brackish waters can channel the power of Nature to inflict moderate damage.
effectText: Nature Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Nature Torrent
description: "Chromeon, hit them with the power of Nature!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Nature Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Neutral Stream
description: Cute but still fight-savvy, Koish know how to inflict moderate Neutral damage.
effectText: Neutral Stream deals damage to a single target.

name: Neutral Torrent
description: "Chromeon, shower them with torrential power!" This technique inflicts moderate damage.
effectText: Neutral Torrent deals damage to a single other target.

name: Nibble
description: Many Temtem have this habit of gently chewing plants and furniture. This is a little less gentle.
effectText: Nibble deals damage to a single other target.

name: Nicho Sai
description: This basic strike for sai delivers a powerful Melee technique.
effectText: Nicho Sai deals damage to a single other target.

name: Nightmare Feed
description: Nothing creepier than feeding on a sleeping victim... Inflicts 30% damage to a sleeping enemy and heals the user by 30%.
effectText: Nightmare Feed causes a single target to lose 30% of their maximum HP and the user to restore 30% of their maximum HP if the target is afflicted with the Asleep Condition. It will not cause the target to wake up.

name: Nimble
description: Through rigorous training, Temtem can become extra fast and gain SPD .
effectText: Nimble gifts a single other target with SPD .

name: Ninja Jutsu
description: The secret arts of the Cipanku shinobi! This technique lets you backstab enemies in the blink of an eye.
effectText: Ninja Jutsu deals damage to a single other target.

name: Nito Seiho
description: Derived from Cipanki martial traditions, this technique deals a powerful Melee strike and gives them DEF .
effectText: Nito Seiho deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with DEF .

name: Novice Punch
description: Just one step above a slap, but everybody's got to start somewhere.Used in combination with a Melee ally, it changes the technique type to Melee and becomes a more powerful punch.
effectText: Novice Punch deals damage to a single other target.
synergyText: If used with a Melee ally, it becomes Melee Type and its damage increases to 51.

name: Noxious Bomb
description: This nasty stinker inflicts Toxic damage... Just don't use it in an elevator...
effectText: Noxious Bomb deals damage to a single target.

name: Oshi-Dashi
description: Going for the ring out can be a dangerous Melee move in the smallest islands...
effectText: Oshi-Dashi deals damage to a single other target.

name: Outgrowth
description: Behold Tyranak's complete mastery over everything that grows and thrives in their realm! Damages the whole enemy team, decreases their Stamina by 20%, and traps them for 2 turns.
effectText: Outgrowth deals damage to the rival team or the user's ally, causes them to lose 20% of their maximum STA, and inflicts them with the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Overclock
description: Unrecommended for longer periods, this technique makes your 'Tems go way faster, bestowing SPD .
effectText: Overclock gifts the user with SPD .

name: Paralyzing Poison
description: This strong venom traps and poisons the target for 3 turns. Inflicts ATK and SPATK .Used in combination with a Toxic ally, the poisoning lasts for 6 turns.
effectText: Paralyzing Poison inflicts a single other target with the Poisoned Condition for 3 turns and inflicts ATK and SPATK .
synergyText: If used with a Toxic ally, the Poisoned Condition lasts 6 turns.

name: Peck
description: All beaked Temtems like to playfully peck their tamers. This is the less friendly version.
effectText: Peck deals damage to a single other target.

name: Penance
description: Blood magic requires blood sacrifice - will you pay the price? Loatle can inflict 20% of damage on itself to boost the ATK and SPATK of the target.
effectText: Penance gifts a single other target with ATK and SPATK but causes the user to lose 20% of their maximum HP.

name: Perfect Jab
description: Strike smarter, not harder. Weak, but enemy get DEF .
effectText: Perfect Jab deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with DEF .

name: Petal Dagger
description: Even the most harmless flowers have their weapons. Kill them all with softness!
effectText: Petal Dagger deals damage to a single other target.

name: Petrify
description: Have a heart... of stone. It doesn't hurt much, but it leaves enemies trapped for 3 turns.
effectText: Petrify deals damage to a single target and inflicts them with the Trapped Condition for 3 turns.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Nature Temtem are unique in their use of Pan-sunlight to nourish themselves and recover 50% STA.
effectText: Photosynthesis restores 50% of the user's maximum STA.

name: Pickpocket
description: A dirty trick from the seedier alleys of Lochburg, uses nimble fingers (or claws) to Seize the target for 2 turns.
effectText: Pickpocket deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Seized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Piercing Wheel
description: Zizare's signature technique - a fast attack that terrifies enemies DEF and lifts your spirits, giving you Vigor for 2 turns.
effectText: Piercing Wheel deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with DEF while also gifting the user with the Invigorated Condition for 2 turns.

name: Piezoelectric Blow
description: This Temtem can compress a part of its body to unleash an electric shock - fast and damaging.Oh, and you have an earthing electrode? Used in combination with an Earth ally, Piezoelectric Blow inflicts additional damage and seizes for 2 turns.
effectText: Piezoelectric Blow deals damage to a single target.
synergyText: If used with an Earth ally, its damage increases to 155 and also inflicts the Seized Condition for 2 turns.

name: Plague
description: A nasty lurgy that damages the target and leaves it Exhausted for 1 turn.
effectText: Plague deals damage to a single other target and inflicts them with the Exhausted Condition for 1 turn.
